abstract: Google is teaming with big record labels to let Chinese Web surfers freely download music using its site. It hopes to build traffic and win new advertisers.
snippet: Google is teaming with big record labels to let Chinese Web surfers freely download music using its site. It hopes to build traffic and win new advertisers.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  Can global music companies make money by giving away songs in China, where piracy is rampant?

headline.main: Google and Music Labels Bet on Downloads in China
headline.print_headline: Google and the Big Music Labels Are Betting on Free Downloads in China

abstract: T-Mobile plans to sell a home phone early next year and soon after a tablet computer, both running Android, according to confidential documents obtained from one of the company’s partners.
snippet: T-Mobile plans to sell a home phone early next year and soon after a tablet computer, both running Android, according to confidential documents obtained from one of the company’s partners.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  T-Mobile is planning an aggressive push deep into the home with a variety of communications devices that will use Google’s new Android operating software that already runs one of its cellphones.

headline.main: T-Mobile to Use Google Software in Devices for Home
headline.print_headline: T-Mobile to Use Google Software in Devices for Home

abstract: It seems that rumors that Google is in talks to buy Twitter just won’t go away.
lead_paragraph: It seems that rumors that Google is in talks to buy Twitter just won’t go away.

headline.main: Rumors of Google Talks for Twitter Persist
